article.name: Magic Girl Closeup
article.description:
Sneaky preview of the cosplay banner. Used Gavin Leung\'s sketch, coloured it in by request, and posted this here headshot at 1:1 drawing resolution.
Tools: paint shop pro, brush, wacom tablet, lots of layers, vector pen tool. Done in my amateurish animu style.
article.keywords: magic girl closeup blue hair yellow eyes paint shop pro wacom tablet layers vector pen tool anime eyes animu.
